entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Wind becoming west 20 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
